results.title: Pharmacy Technician or Dispenser
results.description: Pulse has a client who is looking for a Pharmacy Technician or Dispenser to join their team on a full time permanent basis. The Pharmacy Technician or Pharmacy Dispenser will be working within a Private Hospital in Bristol. They will work closely with a team of Pharmacy staff and also helping patients with their treatments. It is essential the Pharmacy Technician has an NVQ 3 and the Pharmacy Dispenser has an NVQ 2. No previous hospital experience is needed however it would be ideal. What they …

results.title: Pacing Physiologist - Surrey
results.description: Frontline are currently recruiting for an Invasive Physiologist based in Surrey. Duties include: Work in a busy NHS Cardiology team alongside their existing team to complete a range of Invasive tests including Cath lab & Pacing. Skills & Experience: The ideal candidate would have previous hospital exposure in a similar environment covering an invasive role. Requirements: Relevant Cardiology Degree / Qualifications What you can expect from Frontline: •Excellent rates of pay •Access to exclusive …

results.title: Invasive Physiologist - Buckinghamshire
results.description: Frontline Staffing are currently enrolling for an Invasive Physiologist who is ideally accredited with BHRS or IBHRE for a permanent role based in Buckinghamshire. Located in a town which is home to one of the first football clubs in Britain, and the placement offers great links to local amenities and transport links. Some of your main responsibilities will include: •Cath Lab •Pacing •ETT •Tapes Job Description will be available upon request.

results.description: About Farmdrop Farmdrop represents a new economic approach to food retailing whereby the benefits of cutting out the middlemen are shared between customers who enjoy fresher, healthier food at lower prices, and smaller scale producers who enjoy best-ever trading terms. Our mission is to Fix The Food Chain, something we plan to do by providing Londoners with their best food retail experience in 2016 before scaling further afield in 2017. Our supporters include London foodies Gizzi Erskine and To…

Caspian One are working with a dynamic/award winning technology company in the heart of the city. For this role my client requires a senior Build engineer to work on one of their flagship projects. Lead Dispensary Pharmacist
results.description: Pulse has a client who is looking for a Lead Dispensary Pharmacist on a full time permanent basis for a private hospital in London. The Lead Pharmacist in Dispensary will be responsible for the daily clinical aspects relating to outpatients and will deputise alongside the Lead Clinical Pharmacist for the Chief Pharmacist when required. They will write and review all pharmacy procedures and protocols within area of responsibility. The post holder will ensure prescriptions requiring dispensing ar…
